trends: There have been 30 other sightings in McKinney
There were no other sightings in McKinney on or around October 7th 2011
Summary: starlike object or objects make a plus sign high in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsOct. 7, 2011 guessing about 9 pm Last night standing beside my pickup in the driveway facing south. Nearly over head at about a 80 degree angle I saw small pinpoints of light like stars. first light went east for about two seconds then went out. Then the second light from the same starting point went west for about two seconds and went out. Then another point of light appeared went south for about two seconds and went out. Then another point of light appeared went north for about two seconds also went out. It looked like if you joined them all from their starting points that they formed a plus sign in their flight paths.
